features: Calm Your Senses: Help yourself unwind with our nourishing De-Stress Hand & Body Lotion. Comforting lotion contains soothing Rhodiola Rosea and Hemp Seed Oil, and adaptogenic Ashwagandha to smooth and soften your skin
Pamper Your Skin: Soothing de-stress lotion helps to improve skin's moisture retention for sustained softness
Relaxing Scent: Allow the aroma of lavender and ylang ylang to ease your senses with its comforting scent . Ylang ylang and lavender lotion is scented with essential oils, not synthetic fragrances

Cruelty-Free and Vegas Formulation: Our hand and body lotion has no parabens or phthalates, no sodium lauryl/laureth sulfates, no artificial colors, and no mineral oil or formaldehyde donors. Lotion is not tested on animals
Easy Pump Dispenser: 16 oz bottle has an easy-to-use pump dispenser
body.description: Envelop your body in calming moisture when using our De-Stress Hand & Body Lotion. This nourishing lotion is infused with soothing Rhodiola Rosea and Hemp Seed Oil and adaptogenic Ashwagandha for calmed and comforted skin. Available in fragrance free and relaxing Lavender and Ylang Ylang, our vegan lotion is scented with essential oils, not synthetic fragrances. Moisturizing lotion, suitable for both the hands and body, helps the skin retain moisture for a soft and smooth feel long after application. Cruelty-free lotion has no parabens or phthalates, no sodium lauryl/laureth sulfates, no artificial colors, and no mineral oil or formaldehyde donors.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Kiss My Face prides itself on wholesome personal care products for the entire family…because we care. We strive to support everyday family values while making it easier to care for yourself and your family. Our effective products are made from as many close-to-nature, wholesome, high-quality, clean ingredients as possible…because we care about the ingredients. It’s the mission of KMF to find and combine these wholesome ingredients to create the most effective and consistently better body and personal care products. Kiss My Face was originally founded by Bob Macleod and Steve Byckiewicz on a 200 acre farm in New York’s beautiful Hudson River Valley. The personal care company began at the dawn of the 1980’s with its well-known big, green, olive bars of soap from Greece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Kiss My Face for some 20 years. For a short time when my go to store stopped stocking it I tried other products. They never came up to my satisfaction. Now, using again, I have noticed a big difference in my skin. I'm 86 years old and recently,when I attended a high-school reunion, the girl with whom I went to the senior prom, got up close and looked over my face and asked " who does your work". A great product.

reviews.reviewerName: Love this product.  It's also good for the environment.  NO PLASTIC.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best moisturizer.
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin as well as perfume allergies. This is the best moisturizer I have ever used and fragrance free. I can use this year round, even in the cold dry winters and it just keeps your skin happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product came with the top loose and the leaked contents coating the inside of the packaging. When I used it, it was very watery and doesn't seem to moisturize as well as other of their products. I was disappointed and won't order it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have no allergic reactions to this product.
reviews.reviewText: I actually use this lotion on my face as well as elsewhere because I have such dry skin. With most lotions, usually after using for a few months, my skin gets itchy after use and I have to stop and find a new product. I have used this one for 2 years so far and have had no bad reaction to it. It's light and fragrance free which is very important to me because I do not like smelling any fragrances that I apply.I highly recommend it.I have good results with all the Kiss My Face products that I have tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement for the old Olive and Aloe Formula
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't find my old Kiss My Face Lotion, so I decided to try this. It appears the ingredients are better and when I use it, it seems to absorb better and my dry skin feels replenished.. At first it seemed runny, but then I shook the bottle and things got better. I'm enjoying this as the replacement for a lotion I used for about 25 years. I'm glad they put out another product that is just as good as the one they stopped making.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lotion is great. Shipping, not so much!
reviews.reviewText: Lotion is great. Shipping, not so much! It arrived with the lotion everywhere inside the box! all over the other items in the box. The cap was evidently loose. Whoever packs these items needs to ensure that caps are tightened!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff. I work in a laundry and my hands are always dry. This stuff works. Amazingly. I have numerous bottle stashed around the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely LOVE this lotion! I wanted a good natural lotion that is fragrance free, moisturizes well, yet isn't greasy or slow absorbing. This lotion is the best natural lotion I've ever used and checks all of the boxes. I just started using it on my face too and I'm already loving the results. I'll be sticking to this lotion for my face and body. Please don't stop making this lotion, Kiss My Face!!
